job_history.work_description: Provide excellent customer service by responding to customer interactions via the telephone, email, or internet, in a professional, courteous, accurate manner while recording a brief overview of communication. Resolves customer inquiries and concerns with first call resolution; assist with the members needs regarding benefits, eligibility, claims, financial spending accounts, health reimbursement accounts, and correspondence.

Maintained confidentiality and compliance standards at all times. Met with patients and families to discuss care and plan of action for future. Maximized preventative care utilization to reduce hospital burden and help eliminate readmissions.

Coached students on useful life and personal care skills. Performed several administrative duties, including room transfers, incident reports and maintenance requests. Encouraged a community atmosphere by implementing educational and social programs.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience providing excellent customer service via telephone, email, or internet, resolving customer inquiries and concerns with first call resolution, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Effectively communicated with customers, patients, and families, and recorded brief overviews of communication, suggesting strong proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Resolved customer inquiries and concerns, and maximized preventative care utilization to reduce hospital burden, indicating a solid working proficiency in problem-solving.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Coached students on useful life and personal care skills, and encouraged a community atmosphere by implementing educational and social programs, showing a solid level of proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Managed multiple administrative duties, including room transfers, incident reports, and maintenance requests, indicating a solid working proficiency in time management.

skills.name: Confidentiality and Compliance
skills.explanation: Maintained confidentiality and compliance standards at all times, suggesting a solid working proficiency in handling sensitive information.

skills.name: Healthcare
skills.explanation: Worked with patients and families to discuss care and plan of action for future, but lacks extensive experience in healthcare, indicating some practical experience.
